mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_GENDER, NAVER_FL FROM "TB_MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "TB_MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "TB_MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname}

SELECT tb.BOOKING_DATE AS bookingDate, tp.PAID_AT AS paidAt, tb.MERCHANT_UID AS bookingId, pd.PRFNM AS performanceName, TO_CHAR(ts.SHOW_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || ts.SHOW_TIME AS showDateTime, COUNT(ts.SEATS_ID) AS ticketCount, TRUNC(ts.SHOW_DATE - 1) AS cancelableUntil, CASE WHEN ts.SEAT_STATUS = 'BOOKED' THEN '예매' WHEN ts.SEAT_STATUS = 'CANCELED' THEN '취소' ELSE '기타' END AS bookingStatus FROM TB_TICKET_BOOKING tb JOIN TB_TICKET_SEAT ts ON tb.MT20ID = ts.MT20ID AND tb.MEMBER_NO = ts.MEMBER_NO JOIN TB_PERFORMANCES_DETAIL pd ON tb.MT20ID = pd.MT20ID JOIN TB_PAYMENT tp ON tb.MERCHANT_UID = tp.MERCHANT_UID WHERE tb.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} GROUP BY tb.BOOKING_DATE, tp.PAID_AT, tb.MERCHANT_UID, pd.PRFNM, ts.SHOW_DATE, ts.SHOW_TIME, ts.SEAT_STATUS

SELECT tb.BOOKING_DATE AS bookingDate, tp.PAID_AT AS paidAt, tb.MERCHANT_UID AS bookingId, pd.PRFNM AS performanceName, TO_CHAR(ts.SHOW_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || ts.SHOW_TIME AS showDateTime, COUNT(ts.SEATS_ID) AS ticketCount, LISTAGG(ts.SEATS_ID, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ts.SEATS_ID) AS seatInfo, TRUNC(ts.SHOW_DATE - 1) AS cancelableUntil, CASE WHEN ts.SEAT_STATUS = 'BOOKED' THEN '예매' WHEN ts.SEAT_STATUS = 'CANCELED' THEN '취소' ELSE '기타' END AS bookingStatus, tp.PAID_AMOUNT AS totalPaid FROM TB_TICKET_BOOKING tb JOIN TB_TICKET_SEAT ts ON tb.MT20ID = ts.MT20ID AND tb.MEMBER_NO = ts.MEMBER_NO JOIN TB_PERFORMANCES_DETAIL pd ON tb.MT20ID = pd.MT20ID JOIN TB_PAYMENT tp ON tb.MERCHANT_UID = tp.MERCHANT_UID WHERE tb.MERCHANT_UID = #{bookingId} AND tb.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} GROUP BY tb.BOOKING_DATE, tp.PAID_AT, tb.MERCHANT_UID, pd.PRFNM, ts.SHOW_DATE, ts.SHOW_TIME, ts.SEAT_STATUS, tp.PAID_AMOUNT
